name: Amoonguss
author: GOSSAN
flavor_text: This Pokémon puffs poisonous spores at its foes. If the spores aren’t washed off quickly, they’ll grow into mushrooms wherever they land.

abilities.name: Surprise Spores
abilities.effect: During your opponent’s turn, if this Pokémon is discarded from your hand by an effect of an attack or Ability from your opponent’s Pokémon, or by an effect of your opponent’s Item or Supporter cards, discard your opponent’s hand.

attacks.name: Hypno Hammer
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Asleep.
